# nlgeocoder

## Installation

You can install nlgeocoder from github with:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("uRos2018/nlgeocoder")
```

## Example

```{r example}
## basic example code
library(nlgeocoder)
adres <- nl_suggest("Dam, Amsterdam")
adres$response$docs
```
